title: The Unseen Hero: The Story of David Sanders
summary: David Sanders, a retired mentor aged 79, discovers latent powers that help him confront problems in his community, leading to a week of mysterious and heartwarming adventures.
summaryGerman: David Sanders, ein pensionierter Mentor im Alter von 79 Jahren, entdeckt latente Kräfte, die ihm helfen, Probleme in seiner Gemeinde zu bewältigen, und führt zu einer Woche voller mysteriöser und herzerwärmender Abenteuer.
summaryDutch: David Sanders, een gepensioneerde mentor van 79 jaar, ontdekt latente krachten die hem helpen problemen in zijn gemeenschap aan te pakken, wat leidt tot een week vol mysterieuze en hartverwarmende avonturen.
summaryFrench: David Sanders, un mentor à la retraite âgé de 79 ans, découvre des pouvoirs latents qui l'aident à faire face aux problèmes de sa communauté, conduisant à une semaine d'aventures mystérieuses et chaleureuses.

story.text: David Sanders feels an odd tingling sensation while mentoring, hinting at unseen powers beginning to stir.
Excited by his newfound abilities, David helps a lost child find their way home using his intuition, feeling unexpectedly energetic.
In his garden, David telepathically communicates with a distressed neighbor, helping resolve a family feud, feeling a sense of peace.
During a community meeting, David predicts a minor earthquake and evacuates the hall, saving many. His heroism remains unnoticed.
Mentoring at the local school, David inspires students with stories of his unnoticed adventures, feeling a mix of pride and sadness.
While walking, David encounters someone from his past, leading to old memories and a newfound romantic connection.
Reflecting on his week, David writes a guide for future mentors, ensuring his legacy of unseen heroism.

moral: True heroism often goes unnoticed, but its impact is profound and lasting.
